attributes.action: Provide accommadation in London similar to military married quarters for MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Basically furnished married quarters are deemed sufficient for the armed forces. They may provide their own furnishings at their own expense and are liable for their own living expenses. If this system is good enough for those who put their lives on the line doing their duty, should it not be good enough for those who decide when and where they do their duty?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
